tabs.name: Our Mission
tabs.content:
Save Soil is a Global Movement to invoke a conscious approach to soil and planet in all. One of the main objectives of the movement is to show governments across the world that their citizens want policies that revitalize ecology and soil. 
 Isha Outreach will partner with the Save Soil movement to facilitate its execution in India. Already, thousands of eminent figures, including scientists, celebrities, policy experts, and even heads of states are coming together with this common goal to restore soil health and rekindle our bond with Mother Earth..
